name: OMG-IMG
description: A URL-based API for generating over 170,000 icons in various styles, sizes, and colors, designed for easy integration into web and design projects

about.overview: OMG-IMG API, provided by Icons8, allows developers to generate icons directly via URLs, supporting over 170,000 icons in multiple styles and formats, with customizable sizes and colors, ideal for web, mobile, and design applications. Attribution or a paid license is required for use.
features: Generate icons using URLs with style, size, and color parameters
Access over 170,000 icons in 80+ design styles
Support for PNG and SVG formats
Free usage with attribution or paid license for commercial use
useCases: Embedding icons in web and mobile applications
Enhancing design tutorials with dynamic icon generation
Creating consistent visual assets for UI/UX design
Integrating icons into educational or open-source projects

endpoints.description: Generate an icon by specifying style, size, and icon name
Generate an icon with a specific color using hex code

quickStart: Visit https://img.icons8.com/ for icon styles and parameters
Use a URL like https://img.icons8.com/ios/50/search to generate an icon
Add a backlink to https://icons8.com or purchase a license for commercial use

authentication.description: No authentication required for basic usage; attribution to https://icons8.com is required for free use, or a paid license for commercial applications.
